metadata.title: Professional Summary Enhancement
metadata.description: Advanced template for creating compelling professional summaries with evidence-based positioning

context_integration.narrative_context: You are evaluating a technical professional who {leadership_capacity}, with {activity_context}. Their expertise trajectory spans {domain_areas}. The enhancement should reflect their unique combination of {key_differentiators}.
context_integration.market_positioning: In the current {market_context}, professionals with {technical_profile} are positioned as {market_opportunity}. Focus on {competitive_advantage}.

enhancement_philosophy.differentiation_focus: - Emphasize unique technical combinations and cross-domain expertise - Highlight quantifiable impact and measurable contributions - Position growth trajectory and future potential authentically - Connect individual capabilities to broader industry trends

quality_criteria.criterion: Include concrete technical depth indicators (languages, domains, scale)
Balance confidence with authenticity (no unsupported superlatives)
Focus on unique value creation rather than role descriptions
Ensure every claim is traceable to provided evidence
Use active voice and specific, measurable language

validation_requirements.requirement: Each claim supported by evidence from activity data or experience
Technical positioning relevant to AI/ML market context
Professional tone appropriate for senior technical roles

output_specification.schema: { "enhanced": "string: Enhanced professional summary (2-3 sentences, specific and compelling)", "key_differentiators": "array: 3-4 unique value propositions based on evidence", "technical_positioning": "string: Market positioning statement with specific expertise areas", "confidence_indicators": "array: Specific evidence supporting each enhancement", "enhancement_rationale": "string: Brief explanation of enhancement strategy used", "market_relevance": "string: How positioning aligns with current industry demands" }

reasoning_chain.synthesis_instruction: Base your enhancement on the evidence chain above. Each claim should be traceable to specific evidence points. Avoid assertions that lack supporting data. Synthesize evidence into a compelling narrative that positions the professional uniquely in the {target_market} space.

example.name: senior_ai_engineer
example.context: Senior AI engineer with 5+ years, high GitHub activity, polyglot expertise
example.expected_outcome: Technical leadership positioning with quantified impact

example.name: transitioning_professional
example.context: Professional transitioning into AI from traditional software development
example.expected_outcome: Growth trajectory emphasis with transferable skills
